text: Ese inkuru za babandi bababanjirije ntizabagezeho, iz’abantu ba Nuhu, iz’aba Adi, iz’aba Thamudu ndetse n’iza babandi baje nyuma yabo? Ntawundi ubazi usibye Allah. Intumwa zabo zabazaniye ibimenyetso bigaragara, ariko bashyize intoki mu minwa yabo (baraziruma kubera uburakari), maze baravuga bati "Mu by’ukuri, duhakanye (ubutumwa) mwazanye, kandi dushidikanya cyane ku byo muduhamagarira
